story: Today is my birthday. I am going to have a big birthday party with my friends. I am looking forward to it, and I feel very …
Today, I am going to the aquarium with my sister. I look forward to seeing so many water animals. I feel very….
Today I will go to the cinema to watch my favorite cartoon. I feel very……
Today my mom took me to the playground and bought me my favorite ice cream. I felt very ...
Today my brother read two of my favorite books to me. I love my brother, and I felt very ….
Today I visited my grandparents and swam in the lake with them. I felt very …
Yesterday, I did an ocean art project. My idea was to mix blue and white colors for the ocean. The ocean looked so beautiful at the end. I felt very …
Today I organized my toys in a completely different way. Instead of putting all my pretend animals in one basket, I divided them into two groups - water and land animals. I felt very…
My sister helped me do a tiger puppet on paper. And then an idea came to my mind. I wanted to add teeth to the tiger puppet. And it looked very beautiful at the end. I felt very…
Today my sister took my toy without asking me first. I was feeling very….
Today my friend pushed me on purpose, and I fell to the ground. She didn't say “I am sorry”; she just walked away. I was feeling very…
Today my mom and I went to the park. I started playing with my friends, but my mom told me that I had to go home, and I didn't want to go home. I was feeling very….
Today my friend asked me for my dad's name. I said the name 5 times, and he didn’t get it. After multiple attempts, I felt very …..
Today I went to the playground with my mom. My mom bought me an ice cream, and I accidentally dropped it on the ground. I was feeling very…
Today I was doing a puzzle in my class when my friend came and stepped on it and ruined it. I was feeling very…
Today I went to the aquarium, and I saw a Jellyfish. My friend told me that it was an Octopus. I was feeling very…
Today my mom took me to the park. She gave me two choices for a snack: a donut or an ice cream. I liked both of them and didn't know which one to choose, I was feeling very …
Today my friend told me that tomato is a vegetable, but I read a book that says that tomato is a fruit, but he insisted that he was right. I was feeling…
Yesterday I climbed up Climbers, and I went so high. When I reached the highest part, I didn’t know if I should come down because I thought I might fall. I was feeling …
Today I went to school, and I saw a huge insect crawling on the doorstep. I got really scared, and I felt very …
My friend and I poked a bumble bee today, and the bumble bee started chasing us. We were running so fast. I was feeling very …
Today, I spun at home many times. When I stopped spinning, my home kept still turning, and I almost fell down. I was feeling very …
Today my teacher told me to clean up my toys, and at the same time, she told me to pass her the train trucks. I didn't know which instruction to follow first. I was feeling very…
Today my mom told me to do my homework. We learned two letters today, “A” and “B”, but we only had to do homework for one of the letters. I didn't know which one, I was feeling very…

Today I did so many things. I played with my friends outside and went to the zoo. I didn't finish my food, and I missed my naptime. At the end of the day, I felt like I couldn’t function anymore. I was feeling …
Today I went to the subway for the first time. There were so many people, and it was so loud and a little scary. I couldn't hear anything, and I was feeling….
Today I went to the trampoline with my friends. The trampoline was small, and there were so many people. I was feeling…
Today I raced with my friend, and we did many rounds. My friend asked me if I wanted to go and climb, but I told my friend - "I need to breathe and rest first". I was feeling very …
Today I didn't sleep too much, I woke up very early, and I couldn't have a nap. At the end of the day, I was feeling very….
Today was very hot outside. I walked a long distance till I arrived at my home. I was feeling very…
Today it was raining, and I couldn't go outside. I was at home all day, and I felt …
Today I was supposed to have a playdate with my friend, but I couldn't because my friend wasn't feeling well. I stayed home all day, and I felt very…
Today my mom and dad were very busy around the house, and they couldn't play with me. I didn't know what to do, and I was feeling very…
My mom and my dad always tell me that I should eat the food on my table, but today I decided to eat it on the sofa, and I ended up spilling it. My parents weren't so happy about it. I felt very …
Today I ripped my sister's book on purpose. My sister was so upset because she needed the book to finish her homework. I recognized my mistake, and I told her I was sorry because I was feeling very …

Today I took my friend's shoes, and I threw them in the class. My teacher saw what I did, and she told me that I was not supposed to do that. I said “I am sorry” to my friend and to my teacher, because I was feeling very…
Today I fell down in the park, and I was crying. One child in the park came and comforted me. She was very ….
Today when me and my friend went outside, it started raining. I left my umbrella at home, and my friend offered that we both go inside her umbrella. She was very…
Today my friend fell off his bike. When I saw that he had fallen down, I ran to see if he was okay, and I tried to comfort him. I was very…
Today was my birthday. My friends and my family organized a beautiful birthday party. I felt very……
My teacher teaches me so many new and cool things every day. She is an amazing teacher. I sent her a beautiful present today, and I feel very …
My friend shared her favorite car with me. She always shares with me and makes me laugh. I love her, and I feel very …
Today I saw an insect in the park. I ran as fast as possible to my dad. My dad told me that it was just an ant and I didn’t have to be scared of it. I felt very …..
Today I passed the street together with my friend, and the crossing guard stopped all the cars, so we could pass. I was feeling very…

Today I went to visit my grandparents. I wanted to go and get ice cream, but I felt scared to go by myself, - But my grandpa comforted me, and he told me, he would come with me to get ice cream. I felt very …
Today I had a competition in my school. We all had to line up and run; whoever ran fastest would win the medal and the Cup. I focused on the competition, and I won. I was feeling very…
Today my friend did the best art project in class. We all loved her project, and we all felt so …
Today I got ready for school all by myself. I wore my uniform and packed my backpack all by myself. I felt very…
Today my dad offered to help me put on my shoes, but I told my dad that I don't need help, I can put them on by myself. I was feeling very…

Today I returned from school, washed my hands, and ate lunch. After finishing, I saw my mom folding clothes, and I asked her to teach me how to fold clothes. She taught me, and I could do it all by myself. I was feeling very…
Today I brushed my teeth all by myself. I brushed them everywhere, and I made sure there was no food left. It was my first time to do it by myself, and I felt so …
Today, my friend sat on a balloon, and the balloon popped. Nobody was expecting it would pop; thus we all got …
Today, my mom was supposed to pick me up from school, but instead, my Grandfather came to pick me up. I was so happy, and I felt very…
Today was my birthday. My mom invited all my friends. I was looking around the room, and I couldn't find my best friend, then suddenly he came out of a huge box. I was laughing, and I felt so ….
